kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.
kw.msg: &{headers} = { IMSI=_ }

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=webserver, url=http://127.0.0.1:5000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Get Request
kw.doc: Send a GET request on the session object found using the given `alias`
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/ path_url=/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.24.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'IMSI': '_'} body=None
GET Response : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/ status=200, reason=OK body=IMSI Header is OK
${resp} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.
